area1.title: What you get
items: Exam-technique playbooks and targeted drills for final-paper performance.
Weekly study plans with measurable goals and accountability.
Calculator mastery (e.g., Casio fx-CG50) and past-paper optimisation.

area2.title: How I teach
items: Live Zoom lessons with iPad + Apple Pencil + GoodNotes for instant feedback.
Clear, step-by-step worked solutions and post-lesson homework.
Cantonese, Mandarin or English delivery; professional, results-first approach.
